name: Phase_O_Implementation_Checklist
purpose: Govern implementation of the planning runtime without enabling execution, autonomy, or activation.

boundary_enforcement: All implemented files fall within declared module boundary
design_conformance: Implementation matches Phase-M design artifacts exactly
negative_capability_preservation: No autonomy or goal generation exists
governance_and_audit: All changes are logged and reviewable

exit_requirements: Explicit authorization required for any execution enablement
notes: Failure to satisfy any item blocks further Phase-O progress.
